DOC.brief_title: Intravenous Sodium Bicarbonate Verifies Intravenous Position Catheters Spontaneously Breathing Adult Volunteers
DOC.detailed_description: Vascular access patient carry significant risk accidental extravasation intravenous ( IV ) fluids medication potential tissue injury . This prospective control study assess diagnostic utility use intravenous diluted sodium bicarbonate confirm placement IV catheters volunteer . Diluted sodium bicarbonate 0.9 % normal saline , inject randomized order end-tidal carbon dioxide exhale air monitor . The investigator hypothesize injected bicarbonate dissolve carbon dioxide water cause transient increase measure exhaled CO2 . Arbitrary increase 10 % end-tidal carbon dioxide consider positive response . The effect unique bicarbonate appear normal saline inject . safety administration bicarbonate metabolic profile volunteer assess measurement venous blood pH electrolyte .
DOC.criteria: ASA I , II cardiovascular respiratory disease ASA > II Cardiovascular disease Respiratory disease renal failure metabolic alkalosis
